Descriptive Metadata.quote: Title, author, subject, keywords describe resource content: Dublin Core elements

Structural Metadata.quote: Organization and relationship information: Table of contents, page sequence

Administrative Metadata.quote: Resource management information: Creation date, file type, permissions

Technical Metadata.quote: System requirements and specifications: File size, resolution, format

Preservation Metadata.quote: Long-term maintenance information: PREMIS data dictionary standard

Rights Metadata.quote: Intellectual property information: Copyright status, license terms

Source Metadata.quote: Origin and provenance information: Original format, digitization details

Schema Standards.quote: XML Schema, JSON Schema define metadata structure and validation

Dublin Core.quote: 15 core elements: title, creator, subject, description, publisher, etc.

MODS.quote: Metadata Object Description Schema: Richer than Dublin Core, XML-based

MARC.quote: Machine Readable Cataloging: Library catalog standard since 1960s

EXIF.quote: Image metadata: Camera settings, date, GPS coordinates

ID3.quote: Audio file metadata: Artist, album, genre, year, track number

File System Metadata.quote: Creation time, modification time, access permissions, size

Web Metadata.quote: Meta tags, SEO information, Open Graph protocol

Geographic Metadata.quote: Spatial reference systems, coordinate systems, projections

Business Metadata.quote: Data ownership, business rules, data quality metrics

Security Metadata.quote: Classification levels, encryption details, access controls

Version Metadata.quote: Change history, revision numbers, update logs

Process Metadata.quote: Workflow steps, transformation rules, data lineage

Quality Metadata.quote: Accuracy metrics, completeness measures, validation results

User Metadata.quote: Tags, ratings, comments, annotations added by users
